description: Images from Istanbul after the historic Unesco site is converted back into a mosque.
title: In pictures: Hagia Sophia opens for Muslim worship
title_page: In pictures: Hagia Sophia opens for Muslim worship - BBC News
maintext: Hagia Sophia, which was built 1,500 years ago, was a Orthodox Christian cathedral until the Ottoman conquest in the 15th Century. Protests have been planned in the Greek capital, Athens, later on Friday against its reconversion into a mosque.
